articles.content: Brad Fittler says it was tough not being able to give a NSW debut to Ryan Papenhuyzen or Cam McInnes but has kept the faith with the 17 that won game two despite a lack of utility value on the bench.… [+4280 chars]

articles.title: Manchester United's Paul Pogba calls France duty breath of fresh air - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Paul Pogba has said that his time away from Manchester United when he is playing with France is a "breath of fresh air."
articles.content:

articles.title: Penrith Panthers NRL player Brent Naden admitted to voluntary rehabilitation program - ABC News
